extendedInfo.description: (Screenshots note : cannot display copyrighted game picture)DroidGEN is a Genesis (known in Europe as Megadrive) emulator for Android.It targets "modern" Android devices running on Android 2.3+ and provides unmatched speed and compatibility.Get the best Genesis emulator for your Android devices, for less than an coffee !DroidGEN features a host of impressive features :- 99.9% compatibility on Genesis games- Customizable on-screen buttons (size and position)- Easy-to-use, non-bloated, clean GUI- Save state support- Hand-crafted optimized code to save battery life- Full support for physical controllers- XPeria Play supportDroidGEN has been successfully tested on a wide range of devices, including these popular ones :- Acer Iconia Tab A100/A200/A500- HTC Desire HD, EVO 3D- Samsung Galaxy S, Galaxy S2, Galaxy S3, Galaxy Tab- Sony XPeria Play, XPeria S, XPeria U, XPeria PDroidGEN proved emulation engine is compatible with virtually ALL Genesis/Megadrive games released. Currently working for future updated on support for Master System, Game Gear and Sega CD. *GPL Compliance. This product is making use of some GPLed code. Please send a request by email to droidhits@gmail.com and I will happily provide you with full source code under 7 days, in full compliance with GPL license. You can read GPLv2 license here : http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-2.0.htmlSource Code is available at http://www.droidhits.com/DroidGEN-1.0-GPL.zip* Important Note for Google Play Team: If Brad G. (alias Michael T., alias David A. ) sends a (bogus) DMCA notice regarding this app, as he threatened me by email, please be aware he is NOT representing Genesis Plus GX team, and that I complied with GPL license on 2012/08/12 per request, and will provide email conversation as proof.

reviews.title: Xperia s
reviews.comment: Mint! Could u guys maybe update to sega 32x? then u get 5 stars, great app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great apart from terrible audio
reviews.comment: This app works great apart from the sound which is awful and nothing i do in the settings makes any difference. If it wasn\'t for that would be an five star app.
reviews.author: Craig Robert Hill

reviews.title: Good but needs work
reviews.comment: I have a HTC evo 4g and this app lets me play all regular genises games so far but I bought this for the 32x roms and I can\'t get any to work would love to be able to play star wars arcade please fix
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Some issues but promising
reviews.comment: Works well on Galaxy Nexus (unlike some other emulators) but there seems to be no way to exit a game. Could also use some UI improvements. It\'s very promising though and the developer respects the GPL.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: Works good almost done with boogerman :) galaxy s3 user Note: please fix save state feature don\'t work. thanks
reviews.author: David Felte

reviews.title: It works....
reviews.comment: But you should be able to stretch the display to fit the screen.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ics
reviews.comment: Games doesn\'t load, the screen stays black or it goes back to the app\'s main menu
reviews.author: Aj Foodinspector

reviews.title: Hmm
reviews.comment: Won\'t recognize roms from sites I\'ve used for other emulators (so I know its not the Roms fault) Not easy to use
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sound ???
reviews.comment: Great app brings back my childhood favourite\'s:-)  but the sound does not work can any one help. If sound worked id give 5stars easy.
reviews.author: Barry Jessup

reviews.title: LG Optimus L9
reviews.comment: Overall its pretty good games run and look great but the sound is a bit off almost as if its in a deeper tone and running in slo mo even tho the games themselves run good. once fixed its a 5 star from me.
reviews.author: Cameron Blair

reviews.title: Love it !
reviews.comment: Must have app for old school gamers worth every penny. . .using verizon galaxy nexus If that helps
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Kinda annoyed how i can download an SNES rom and it will work then i can download a genesis rom from the same site and it..doesnt work with this app
reviews.author: John Osterling

reviews.title: No updates
reviews.comment: Get MD.EMU EMULATOR ITS DA BEST
reviews.author: william billadeau
